list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He accompanied her to the door.

list_definition.definition: to play a musical instrument to go along with (a singer etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She accompanied him on the cello.

list_definition.definition: to happen, exist, or appear with something else

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His speech was accompanied by loud cheering from the crowd.
